name: RES_REPEAT_COMP_SNOMED
description: This table contains the SNOMED codes for component repeats as reported by the external resulting agency.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the specific repeat of a component on the result from the RES_REPEAT_COMP table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple SNOMED codes for this specific repeat of the component on the result.

columns.name: SNOMED_CODE
columns.description: The SNOMED code associated with the value for the specific repeat of the component on this result as reported by the external resulting agency.
